summary: A few Reshade presets designed to add unique colors to the game without steam-rolling FPS. Uses Reshade 1.1
descriptionHtml:
[u]Important:[/u] Different weather/lighting/texture mods will give different results than shown in screenshots. Also, please post some of your own favorite screenshots.

Requirements:
- Skyrim
- [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/43ulu31ui431z43/ReShade_Framework_1.1.0.7z]Reshade Framework 1.1[/url]
- Windows Vista or higher
- DirectX End-User Runtime

Installation Instructions:
-Download the Reshade Framework
-Unpack the ReShade Framework 1.1.0 file and place its contents anywhere
-Download my preset(s)
-Unpack and merge the included Reshade folder with your own.

-Run Mediator.exe
-Click the 'Add' button and direct the program to TESV.exe (Main Skyrim folder)
-Choose one of my presets from the drop-down list next to the 'Add' button
-Click the 'Apply' button in the top-right corner
-Run the game

[url=http://imgur.com/hCoClCx][img]http://i.imgur.com/hCoClCx.png[/img][/url]

Optional Instructions:
Alt-Tab while running the game to switch and test multiple presets using Mediator



Join our discord server for mod info and upcoming changes [url=https://discord.gg/nhbJyQ]https://discord.gg/nhbJyQ[/url]﻿


[b][u]Suggested Mods
[/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21642/?]CLO Custom Lighting Overlay[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8707/?]Dragon Warrior Effects 15[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13049/?]IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim[/url] - Fine tuning colors, brightness, bloom

[/u][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]
